items.strItemDescription: Suggested by Reis! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
Suggested by Reki! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

And you thought falling into poison ivy was bad! You REALLY don't want to fall into a patch of THIS ivy. But it sure makes great weapons! Suggested by Zhukai, forest wanderer and naturalist extraordinaire! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

When a monster bites you, its bite can often turn septic, and no one wants that! So just be careful when you're playing with the blade of this scythe. Inspired by Eric Ravenwing, Elite Warmonger! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

Crafted in honor of Jester857. The 856 Jesters before didn't have nearly as much talent! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

An olive on a toothpick? Zhukai must be a hungry, hungry weaponsmith! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
An olive on a toothpick? Zhukai must be a hungry, hungry weaponsmith! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
Nature spirits must have protected Margus20000 as he carved these weapons! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
This blade was forged in honor of the Light Lord through the toil and tears of Clyde, luminous weaponcrafter! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
This prototype of this scythe, forged by Tokijin, rests in the Hall of Eternal Light. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

This silver blade is tinted black, and is perfectly crafted for repelling supernatural creatures. The creator's name, "Mephiles the Dark," is etched into the handle. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

An artisan named Marth forged 234 of these weapons in the rejuvenating waters of an ice-cold brook. They retain the icy essence of that flowing elemental stream.
